content: squarshy hat a malabrigo head thingie rip-off by alaina andersen shit you should have - malabrigo mecha 1 skein or another soft squarshy bulky yarn - us size 8 or whatever you got that is a bit smaller than 10 5 and 10 5 or 10 or 11… needles 16 circular work best ribbing - using the smaller needle cast on a goodly number of stitches that are divisible by 2 i did 80 make sure that bitch ain t twisted unless you like that kind of thing join in the round - knit in 1 x 1 twisted rib k1 through back loop p1 repeat knit for like an inch and a half or so whatever looks good make that shit double long for a folded brim what holla when you are done move on to the main event body - switch to larger needles - slipped stitch pattern for body round 1 knit all stitches in round round 2 *slip 1 knit 7* repeat to end of round repeat rounds 1 and 2 until the hat is about 5 5 inches long from the cast on for a beanie or like 7-8 for a drapey hat i made the beanie version and it is awesome oh end on round 1 the knit row that is important sort of decreases - instructions yo follow em round 1 *slip 1 knit 5 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 2 knit all round 3 *slip 1 knit 4 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 4 knit all round 5 *slip 1 knit 3 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 6 knit all round 7 *slip1 knit 2 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 8 knit all round 9 *slip 1 knit 1 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 10 knit all round 11 *slip 1 k2tog* repeat to end of round round 12 *k2tog* repeat to end of round round 13 *k2tog* repeat to end of round break yarn with longish tail thread that shit on a darning needle and run it through the remaining 5 stitches as if to purl duh snug it up put the needle through the center and weave that shit it s yours bitch mmmmm so squarshy if you want it to be even more awesome-er pom-pom that shit c mon son good… obviously better
